mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BBS_TBL WHERE USERID=#{userId} AND SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE BBS_TBL SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content} WHERE USERID=#{userId} AND SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS_TBL (USERID, SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, DIVI, REGDATE, FILECODE) VALUES (#{userId}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ), 0)+1 FROM BBS_TBL WHERE USERID=#{userId}), #{title}, #{content}, #{divi}, sysdate, #{fileCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BBS_TBL WHERE userId = #{userId} AND SEQ=#{seq}
